item.title: The symmetric (2+1)-dimensional Lotka-Volterra equation with self-consistent sources
item.description: arXiv:2404.14969v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: The symmetric (2+1)-dimensional Lotka-Volterra equation with self-consistent sources is constructed using the source generation producure, whose solutions are expressed in terms of pfaffians. As special cases of the pfaffian solutions, different types of explicit solutions are presented, including dromions, soliton solutions and breather solutions.
item.dc:creator: Mengyuan Cui, Chunxia Li, Yuqin Yao
